dialogues.dialogue: *Autumn leaves flutter around, it's the first day of school*

dialogues.name: Player
dialogues.dialogue: Wow, it’s finally the first day of senior year. I can’t believe time has passed by so quickly.

dialogues.name: Teacher
dialogues.dialogue: Welcome everyone, to our first day of school.

dialogues.name: Teacher
dialogues.dialogue: So over the summer, I’m sure many of you forgot the basics to JavaScript and CSS.

dialogues.name: Teacher
dialogues.dialogue: Let’s have a quick review, and then I’ll assign you all a small project.
Sorry Teacher! Got caught up in the main office.

dialogues.name: Teacher
dialogues.dialogue: No problem. Take a seat wherever you want.

dialogues.name: Teacher
dialogues.dialogue: Anyways, everyone, please log into your accounts.
Ah good. I’m LI1 by the way.

dialogues.name: Player
dialogues.dialogue: By the way, I’ve never seen you around. Are you new?

dialogues.name: LI1
dialogues.dialogue: Oh yeah. I transferred here for my last year.

dialogues.name: LI1
dialogues.dialogue: I didn’t really like my old school. Didn’t suit me.

dialogues.name: Player
dialogues.dialogue: I see. Well, welcome to our school.

dialogues.name: Teacher
dialogues.dialogue: Okay, so now for a quick partner project….

dialogues.name: LI1
dialogues.dialogue: Oh wow. Looks like we’re together.

dialogues.name: LI1
dialogues.dialogue: HEY [name}. Wanna sit here or the back?

dialogues.name: Player
dialogues.dialogue: So I was thinking our project could be a video game.

dialogues.name: LI1
dialogues.dialogue: Wow we’ve been working for a while.

dialogues.name: LI1
dialogues.dialogue: Think it’s time to call it a day?

dialogues.name: LI1
dialogues.dialogue: Should we meet again tomorrow or through text?
*Autumn leaves flutter around, it's the first day of school*
